content: Files generated in AI-Chat will appear here automatically. Whenever you generate content, start a chat, or send a message with output, the result will be saved in this section.

comment.text: This text appears within the "Results" tab of an AI Room to explain to users where files generated from AI-Chat are saved. It informs users that results are automatically saved whenever they generate content or send messages with output. Translators should maintain the instructional tone.
